mapper.select: select mr.id, mr.message_id as messageId, mr.reply_user_id as replyUserId,su.nick_name as replyUserName, mr.message,mr.type, mr.send_time as sendTime from message_record mr left join sys_user su on mr.reply_user_id = su.id where message_id = #{messageId} ORDER BY send_time desc

select mr.id, mr.message_id as messageId, mr.reply_user_id as replyUserId,su.nick_name as replyUserName, mr.message,mr.type, mr.send_time as sendTime from message m left join message_record mr on m.id=mr.message_id left join sys_user su on mr.reply_user_id = su.id
m.reply_user_id = #{replyUserId}
and mr.message like CONCAT('%',#{messageLike},'%')
group by mr.message_id having mr.send_time = max(mr.send_time) ORDER BY send_time desc
